channel.title: Writeup on Down the wabbit's hole
channel.description: Recent content in Writeup on Down the wabbit's hole

item.title: Writeup - Trickbot
item.description: Stages: vba dropper in word document vba trick bot is executed: loads part of himself in heap and sets process to suspended (enables it to modify before executing child): execute child and exit first child execution: loads named resource(“IDR_X86BOT” || “IDR_X64BOT”) from himself(encrypted) in heap decrypts the data in heap call second child entrypoint second child execution:
